Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.query.sort

Interface QuerySortColumn

All Superinterfaces:
SortField
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompoundSortColumn, InvalidSortField, PathSortColumn, SimpleSortColumn
public interface QuerySortColumn extends SortField

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAdditionalSort(IQueryBeanResult queryResult, boolean ascending)
     
    void
    addPrimarySort(IQueryBeanResult queryResult, boolean ascending)
     
    default boolean
    isIndexed()
    Return true to indicate that this QuerySortColumn has an appropriate index in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addPrimarySort

      void addPrimarySort(IQueryBeanResult queryResult, boolean ascending)

    • addAdditionalSort

      void addAdditionalSort(IQueryBeanResult queryResult, boolean ascending)

    • isIndexed

      default boolean isIndexed()
      Return true to indicate that this QuerySortColumn has an appropriate index in the database. In general, to work for a sort column, the index must be on (Column, ID) or (Column, Retired, ID), in that order (the column first, ID after).
